name: Form
description: Wrap any HTML form in our progressive enhancement layer to get spam protection, resilient fetch submissions, and friendly status messaging out of the box.
highlights: Honeypot field is generated automatically to discourage bots.
Graceful async submission with loading, success, and error banners.
No imposed styles â€” compose layouts with your own Tailwind utilities.

props.name: formId
props.description: Unique identifier used to wire the client widget to your _nua endpoint and status messages.

props.name: action
props.description: Override the default `/_nua/form/{formId}` endpoint when you need a custom backend.

props.name: successMessage
props.description: Message shown when the submission succeeds. Defaults to "Success!".

props.name: errorMessage
props.description: Message shown when the submission fails. Defaults to "Something went wrong!".

props.name: submittingMessage
props.description: Message shown when the submission is in progress. Defaults to "Submitting...".

props.name: networkErrorMessage
props.description: Message shown when the submission fails due to a network error. Defaults to "Network error!".

props.name: tryAgainMessage
props.description: Message shown when the user can try submitting again. Defaults to "Try again".
